text: Kevin Christie (born April 7, 1950) is an American politician in the state of Vermont. He is a member of the Vermont House of Representatives, sitting as a Democrat from the Windsor-4-2 district, having been first elected in 2010.https://legislature.vermont.gov/people/single/2018.1/15774 ==References== Category:1950 births Category:Living people Category:Members of the Vermont House of Representatives Category:Vermont Democrats
title: Kevin Christie (politician)
